performance_metrics.name: Average Speed (km/h)
performance_metrics.description: Average speed maintained during typical operational cycles. This includes accounting for traffic conditions and route constraints.

performance_metrics.name: Operational Range (km)
performance_metrics.description: Distance the vehicle can travel on a single charge/fuel fill, considering a 20% buffer for energy consumption and route variations.

performance_metrics.name: Passenger Comfort (dB)
performance_metrics.description: Average noise level within the passenger cabin during operation.  Measured at the driver and passenger seats.

performance_metrics.name: Accuracy of Localization (m)
performance_metrics.description: Precision of the vehicle's position determination using GPS, LiDAR, and other sensors.  Crucial for navigation and safety.

performance_metrics.name: Reaction Time (s)
performance_metrics.description: Time taken for the vehicle to respond to a detected hazard or change in traffic conditions.  This includes sensor processing and control system response.

performance_metrics.name: Cargo Capacity (kg)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum weight of cargo the vehicle can transport, dependent on vehicle design and regulatory requirements.

performance_metrics.name: Energy Consumption (kWh/100km)
performance_metrics.description: Energy consumed per 100 kilometers traveled.  Affected by speed, terrain, load, and vehicle efficiency.

implementation_requirements.name: Sensor Suite Integration
implementation_requirements.specification: Must integrate LiDAR (360° coverage, 150m range), Radar (100m range, 50° beam), Cameras (High-resolution, color, 120° field of view), Ultrasonic Sensors (Short-range, 5m range)
implementation_requirements.description: Seamless data fusion and processing from all sensors for comprehensive environmental awareness.

implementation_requirements.name: Redundancy Systems
implementation_requirements.specification: Dual power supply units, redundant steering and braking systems, backup computing platform
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures continued operation in case of component failure.

implementation_requirements.name: Cybersecurity Protocols
implementation_requirements.specification: ISO 27001 compliance, intrusion detection systems, secure communication channels (TLS 1.3 or higher)
implementation_requirements.description: Protection against cyber threats and unauthorized access.

implementation_requirements.name: Mapping & Navigation System
implementation_requirements.specification: High-definition maps (1m resolution), real-time traffic data integration, dynamic route planning

implementation_requirements.name: Vehicle Control System
implementation_requirements.specification: Automated driving algorithms (Level 4 or 5), fail-safe mechanisms, emergency stop functionality
implementation_requirements.description: Robust and reliable control system for autonomous operation.

implementation_requirements.name: Over-the-Air (OTA) Updates
implementation_requirements.specification: Secure and reliable OTA update mechanism for software and map updates
implementation_requirements.description: Allows for continuous improvement and feature enhancements.

industry_standards: ISO 15765 (Automative Communication – Cooperative Functionalities for Intelligent Transport Systems)
SAE J3016 (Automated Driving System – Functional Requirements)
IEC 61508 (Functional Safety of Electrical/Electronic/Programmable Electronic Safety-related Systems)
operational_considerations: Regulatory Compliance (Varies by region – e.g., NHTSA in the US, UNECE R155)
Maintenance Schedules (Predictive maintenance based on sensor data)
Remote Monitoring & Support (24/7 remote operations center)
Training & Certification of Operators (Human-Machine Interface oversight)
Data Privacy & Security (Compliance with GDPR and other data protection regulations)
Infrastructure Requirements (Dedicated lanes, charging infrastructure, communication networks)
